short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Draw on any webpage in real time! Draw, highlight, add shapes & more. Easy to use, perfect for studying & teaching.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hey there! Meet Web Marker – your new companion that lets you draw directly on websites!

With Web Marker, you can draw and write on any webpage like it's a piece of paper. It's super easy and fun!

To make things even easier, we've included some handy keyboard shortcuts for you:

· P : Toggle pencil mode.
· H : Toggle highlighter mode.
· R : Toggle rectangle mode.
· C : Toggle circle mode.
· T : Toggle text mode.
· L : Toggle line mode.
· E : Toggle eraser mode.
· S : Toggle selection mode.
· X : Toggle pointer mode.
· I : Add an image.
· M : Hide/Show the menu.
· D : Download annotations as image.

· ESC : Exit drawing mode.
· DEL : Delete active object(s).

· Ctrl + Z : Undo.
· Ctrl + Y : Redo.
· Ctrl + C : Copy annotations as image.

Here's why users are falling in love with it:

✔ Simple Drawing and Highlighting:
Whether you're studying, teaching, or just love getting creative online, you can easily draw and highlight on pages without any complicated tools. Our keyboard shortcuts make things even easier. You can draw using just your keyboard, whether the menu is collapsed or uncollapsed.

✔ Works Everywhere: 
Web Marker works on almost every website out there. So, doodle away!

✔ Draw Anything: 
You have all the drawing tools you need, from circles to rectangles, a highlighter, pencil, eraser, lines, and text. Easily undo, redo, clear, zoom in, zoom out, select, delete, move, resize, change colors, and adjust the marker size. Choose from a variety of colors or select one of the 33+ default colors. You have plenty of options!

✔ Easy to Use: 
Simply click on the extension icon or use a keyboard shortcut to get started (the default shortcut is Ctrl + Shift + L )

✔ Scrollable: 
It's the ONLY extension that seamlessly keeps what you've written after scrolling up and down the page, ensuring that as you scroll, the drawn content moves along with the page.

✔ Works with Your Stylus: 
Got a stylus? Great! Web Marker plays nice with it.

But wait, there's more!

✔ Collapsible and Movable Menu: 
You know that menu where you find all the tools? You can collapse it to get more space. Plus, you can move it around wherever you like.

✔ Fix Mistakes with Ease: 
Messed up? No worries! Use the eraser or hit delete – it's like magic.

✔ Add Pictures: 
You can even add images and draw on them. How cool is that?

✔ Zoom In, Zoom Out: 
Zoom in to see details or zoom out to see the big picture. It's all up to you.

✔ Undo and Redo: 
Oops, made a mistake? No problem! Just hit undo and redo until it's perfect!

✔ Copy or Download Your Drawing: 
When you're finished, you can copy your drawing or download it as a high-quality image to use it anywhere else.

And here are two more cool things:

✔ ✔  No Data Collection: 
Your data stays YOURS. We do NOT collect ANY of your personal info  – doodle in peace!

✔ ✔  No Special Permissions Needed: 
Just install and go! Web Marker doesn't need special browser permissions.

And guess what? It's completely FREE!

But hold on, you're probably thinking,  how do we keep this awesome tool free for everyone?!!

Well, here's the deal: we believe in keeping things simple and user-friendly. Instead of bombarding you with ads or charging for premium features, we've chosen to operate on a donation basis.

Yep, that's right! We rely on the generosity of users like you who appreciate what we do and want to support us in keeping Web Marker awesome. 

So, If you love using Web Marker and find it valuable, we'd be incredibly grateful if you could consider contributing a donation of any amount you can.

❤  Donate ❤ 

https://links.sfer.dev/webmarker-doante

Every donation goes a long way in helping us maintain and make Web Marker even better for you.

Also feel free to reach out to us with any concerns, feedback, or suggestions you might have.

Happy drawing with Web Marker!
